subject: Baseball (College)
College World Series
Baseball
lead_paragraph: John Norwood’s home run in the top of the eighth inning gave Vanderbilt the lead, and the Commodores beat Virginia, 3-2, on Wednesday night for their first national championship in baseball.
snippet: John Norwood’s home run in the top of the eighth inning gave Vanderbilt the lead, and the Commodores beat Virginia, 3-2, on Wednesday night for their first national championship in baseball.
